enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Co-Chair Karsten Sach outlined pending issues regarding sinks in the CDM, and announced that a Co-Chairs` text will be presented at the contact group meeting on Saturday, 6 December.
A representative of INDIGENOUS PEOPLES` ORGANIZATIONS urged delegates to adopt international standards for socioeconomic and environmental criteria for LULUCF project activities under the CDM.
